mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE CATEGORY = 6 AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, INFO_ADDRESS, TO_CHAR(START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "START_DATE", TO_CHAR(END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "END_DATE", FILE_PATH FROM BOARD B JOIN INFO USING(BOARD_NO) JOIN FESTIVAL USING(BOARD_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT USING(BOARD_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND CATEGORY = 6 AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO, ZONE_NO, INFO_NO, CATEGORY, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITER) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL,#{zoneNo},SEQ_INO.NEXTVAL,6,#{boardTitle},#{boardContent},#{boardWriter})

INSERT INTO INFO (INFO_NO, BOARD_NO, ZONE_NO, INFO_ADDRESS, INFO_TIME, INFO_HOMEPAGE, INFO_CALL, INFO_TYPE) VALUES(SEQ_INO.CURRVAL, SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL, #{zoneNo}, #{infoAddress}, #{infoTime}, #{infoHomepage}, #{infoCall}, 3)
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO, BOARD_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES(SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL,#{originName},#{changeName},#{filePath},#{fileLevel})

INSERT INTO FESTIVAL(BOARD_NO, ZONE_NO, INFO_NO, START_DATE, END_DATE, FES_CATEGORY, FES_MONEY) VALUES(SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL, #{zoneNo}, SEQ_INO.CURRVAL, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{fesCategory}, #{fesMoney})
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, CHOICE, COUNT, INFO_ADDRESS, INFO_TIME, INFO_HOMEPAGE, INFO_CALL, TO_CHAR(START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "START_DATE", TO_CHAR(END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "END_DATE", FES_MONEY, ZONE_NAME FROM BOARD B JOIN INFO USING(BOARD_NO) JOIN FESTIVAL USING(BOARD_NO) JOIN ZONE USING(ZONE_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND CATEGORY = 6 AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
